TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IApplicationTrustManager implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable

summary.span: 判斷是否應執行應用程式，以及應授與該應用程式的使用權限集合。

span.span: Determines whether an application should be executed and which set of permissions should be granted to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信任管理員必須實作介面。Trust managers must implement the interface. 主機會呼叫方法，以判斷是否應執行應用程式和應用程式應授與的權限。The host calls the method to determine whether an application should be executed and which permissions should be granted to the application. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和更新版本中，沒有一個可以是自訂實作的信任管理員的介面。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later, there is only one trust manager, which can be a custom implementation of the interface. 預設信任管理員實作會提示使用者，權限來安裝應用程式，並提高應用程式授與的權限。The default trust manager implementation prompts the user for permission to install the application and to elevate the permissions granted to the application. 其他信任管理員實作可能會提供不同的使用者體驗。Other trust manager implementations might provide different user experiences. 比方說，實作可能會檢查信任的應用程式，而不是提示使用者輸入該資訊的企業清單。For example, an implementation might check an enterprise list for trusted applications instead of prompting the user for that information. ## Examples 下列範例示範的簡單實作。The following example shows a simple implementation of . [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager/CS/customTrustManager.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager/VB/customtrustmanager.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust DetermineApplicationTrust(class System.ActivationContext activationContext, class System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext context) cil managed

span.span: The activation context for the application.

param.name: context
param.span: 此應用程式的信任管理員內容。

span.span: The trust manager context for the application.

summary.span: 判斷是否應執行應用程式，以及應授與該應用程式的使用權限集合。

span.span: Determines whether an application should be executed and which set of permissions should be granted to it.

returns.span: 包含應用程式相關安全性決策的物件。

span.span: An object that contains security decisions about the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法稱為由主機判斷是否應執行應用程式，而且應該授與的權限設定它。The method is called by the host to determine whether an application should be executed and which set of permissions it should be granted. 會傳回物件代表要授與給每個應用程式的內容中執行的組件的權限集的屬性，其中包含的權限。 returns an object with a property that contains a permission set representing the permissions to be granted to each assembly executing within the context of the application. 授與的權限並不適用於在全域組件快取中的組件。The granted permissions do not apply to assemblies in the global assembly cache. 物件還擁有信任管理員會設定以表示是否應信任應用程式的屬性。The object also has an property that the trust manager sets to indicate whether the application should be trusted. 如果信任管理員會指出應用程式可以是受信任，主應用程式啟動應用程式，並授與它的組件中所提供的權限集集合。If the trust manager indicates that the application can be trusted, the host activates the application and grants its assemblies the set of permissions provided in the collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作自訂的信任管理員 」 的方法。The following example shows an implementation of the method for a custom trust manager. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager/CS/customTrustManager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager/VB/customtrustmanager.vb#2)]
